main event: A peculiar flashing, tumbling object was observed in the sky from two aircraft over the Pacific Ocean.
interesting points: The object appeared out of a mushroom-shaped cloud trailing a rainbow-shaped cloud of smoke.,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.,The object climbed to an elevation of about 50 degrees above the horizon.,Its speed was comparable to an echo satellite.,The object's characteristics did not correlate with known missile testing being conducted in the area.
witness description: Two pilots from aircraft in flight
